mapper.select: select NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITTLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, to_char(NOTICE_CREATED, 'YYYY/MM/DD') NOTICE_CREATED, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_HITS from notice where NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main' order by notice_id asc

select NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITTLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, to_char(NOTICE_CREATED, 'YYYY/MM/DD') NOTICE_CREATED, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_HITS from notice where NOT NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main' order by notice_id asc
select NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITTLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, to_char(NOTICE_CREATED, 'YYYY/MM/DD') NOTICE_CREATED, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_HITS from notice where NOTICE_ID = #{noticeID}
mapper.update: update notice set NOTICE_TITTLE = #{NOTICE_TITTLE}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{NOTICE_CONTENT} where NOTICE_ID = #{NOTICE_ID}
update notice set NOTICE_HITS = #{noticeHite} where NOTICE_ID = #{noticeID}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where NOT NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main'
select count(*) from notice where NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main'
